ygData.subject: Research - Need Advice
ygData.msgSnippet: I recently leveled to 16 and would like to start my Research . I have about 50 practice points saved and have only, thus far, used one practice on Research. I
ygData.messageBody:
I recently leveled to 16 and would like to start my "Research". I have about 50 practice points saved and have only, thus far, used one practice on Research. I have not, as yet, purchased the Lexicon which, I understand, I need to further my Research studies. I've started to learn several languages but am a novice in this regard. That's about as far as I am with Research. What exactly is the best way to approach Research? How do you raise your Research skill? Reading books? Any and all advice would be greatly appreciated.

Wizzy
Gnome Wizard
